entities.name: professor mcgonagall
entities.description: Professor McGonagall is a teacher at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry. She is mentioned as pulling a sheet of pink parchment from between the leaves of Harry's folder.

entities.name: professor umbridge
entities.description: Professor Umbridge is a Ministry-appointed teacher at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry. He is mentioned as asking Professor McGonagall if she understood his note.

entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: Harry Potter is a student at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry. He is mentioned as having achieved high marks in all his Defense Against the Dark Arts tests.

entities.name: professor lupin
entities.description: Professor Lupin is a teacher at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry. He is mentioned as thinking Harry Potter showed a pronounced aptitude for the subject.

entities.name: defense against the dark arts
entities.description: Defense Against the Dark Arts is a subject taught at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry.

relationships.description: Professor McGonagall mentions that Harry Potter has achieved high marks in all his Defense Against the Dark Arts tests.
Professor Umbridge is confused with Professor McGonagall about giving Harry Potter false hope.
Professor Lupin thinks that Harry Potter has a pronounced aptitude for the subject of Defense Against the Dark Arts.
